content: persian bath mitt yarn patons grace yarn characteristics this pattern requires a thin yarn i would recommend something like sport or lighter recommended hook size 5mm h- 8 pattern round 1 cast on two chains and crochet 6 single_crochet into first chain slip_stitch to first stitch to complete ring 6 stitches round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch slip_stitch to first stitch 12 stitches round 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times slip_stitch to first stitch 18 stitches round 4 single_crochet single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times slip_stitch to first stitch 24 stitches round 5 single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times slip_stitch to first stitch 30 stitches round 6 single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times slip_stitch to first stitch 36 stitches continue in the same pattern increasing six times each round until item measures 7 inches in diameter i ended up making 17 rounds once your circle has 7 inches in diameter you want to start making the wrist section turn your work ws single_crochet for 20 stitches or approximately 4 inches turn your work rs continue single_crochet keep going until wrist section is 12 row or approximately 2 5 inches long this is the front of the mitt so do the same to crochet the back of the mitt use single_crochet to seam the two sides together weave in ends
